author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Safmar Group Sells 2% Shares In Tatneft
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Tatneft
* RUSSIAN INDUSTRIAL GROUP SAFMAR, CONTROLLED BY BUSINESSMAN MIKHAIL GUTSERIYEV’S FAMILY, HAS SOLD ABOUT 2 PERCENT SHARES IN OIL PRODUCER TATNEFT AS ITS STOCK Quote: S APPEARED ATTRACTIVE FOR SALE, THE GROUP’S REPRESENTATIVE TOLD REUTERS
* HE DID NOT SAY WHICH COMPANY PARTICULARLY WITHIN THE GROUP SOLD THE SHARES
* STATE-OWNED NATIONAL SETTLEMENT DEPOSITORY CONTROLS 60 PERCENT SHARES IN TATNEFT, WHILE 30.45 PERCENT IS OWNED BY CENTRAL DEPOSITORY OF THE REPUBLIC OF TATARSTAN
For the story in Russian, click: Further company coverage: (Reporting by Tatiana Voronova, translated by Gdynia Newsroom)
